body: if you think what we like in hentai which is really nothing but ink on paper reflects what we actually like in our real life, then fine. but then how are you gonna come after me and tell me to kill myself since i like cheating/ntr but you legit recently favorited a lolicon hentai lmfao what. by your logic if liking cheating/ntr makes me a cuck, then by that same logic liking lolicon hentai makes you a pedophile no? hey atleast my tastes don't make me a criminal, just saying (☞ﾟヮﾟ)☞
If you like cheating and ntr then just kill yourself
Tbh I don't really like SINK's works because for me it's similar with Hana Hook & Tanaka Aji. The arts is good but, the way they treat human (woman) as low as trash...
Damn sink and his hardcore... I'm waiting for translate in the story from the first chapter. 5 chapters overall.
